price: 74. Ibliis maahee, wuu is kibriyey, oo ka mid ahaaday gaalada (abaal laawayaasha).
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
